recipes.title: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Soft, chewy, and loaded with chocolate chips, these cookies are a crowd-pleaser.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a large bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla extract.
Gradually mix in the dry ingredients until just blended.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Drop rounded spoonfuls of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, or until lightly golden brown.
Cool on wire racks.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: This quick and easy stir-fry is packed with colorful veggies and flavorful sauce.
instructions: In a wok or large skillet, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat.
Add the onion and garlic and stir-fry for 1 minute.
Add the bell peppers, zucchini, broccoli, snow peas, and mushrooms and stir-fry for 3 to 4 minutes, or until vegetables are tender-crisp.
In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, cornstarch, honey, ginger, and water.
Pour the sauce into the wok and stir-fry for 1 to 2 minutes, or until sauce thickens and coats the vegetables.
Serve over steamed rice.

recipes.title: Classic Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: This classic pizza features a simple but delicious combination of tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a lightly floured surface to your desired thickness.
Spread the tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
Sprinkle the mozzarella cheese over the sauce.
Bake for 10 to 12 minutes, or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted and bubbly.
Top with chopped fresh basil before serving.

recipes.title: Creamy Tomato Soup
recipes.description: This soup is warm, comforting, and perfect for a chilly day.
ingredients: Croutons or toasted bread, for serving
instructions: In a large pot or Dutch oven, melt the butter over medium heat.
Add the onion and garlic and sauté for 5 minutes, or until soft and translucent.
Add the crushed tomatoes and broth and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Stir in the heavy cream, salt, and black pepper.
Using an immersion blender or working in batches in a blender, puree the soup until smooth.
Stir in the chopped basil.
Serve hot with croutons or toasted bread.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: This fresh and colorful salad is a delicious way to enjoy the flavors of the Mediterranean.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper, to taste
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the salad greens, cucumber, red onion, cherry tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.
In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, red wine vinegar, oregano, salt, and black pepper.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.description: This classic Russian dish features tender beef in a creamy sauce, served over egg noodles.
ingredients: 1 lb beef sirloin, cut into thin strips
Salt and black pepper, to taste
12 oz egg noodles, cooked and drained
instructions: In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium-high heat.
Add the beef and cook for 5 to 7 minutes, or until browned and cooked through.
Remove the beef from the skillet and set aside.
Add the onion, garlic, and mushrooms to the skillet and sauté for 5 minutes, or until softened.
Stir in the flour and cook for 1 minute.
Gradually whisk in the beef broth and Dijon mustard, stirring constantly.
Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook for 5 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened.
Remove the skillet from the heat and stir in the sour cream.
Season the sauce with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve the beef stroganoff over the cooked egg noodles.
Garnish with chopped fresh parsley, if desired.

recipes.title: Chili Con Carne
recipes.description: This hearty chili is a classic comfort food that's perfect for cold weather or game day gatherings.
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) kidney beans, drained and rinsed
Salt and black pepper, to taste
Sour cream, shredded cheddar cheese, and sliced green onions, for garnish
instructions: In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat.
Add the onion, garlic, and bell peppers and sauté for 5 minutes, or until softened.
Add the ground beef and cook, stirring occasionally, until browned and cooked through.
Stir in the chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika, and cayenne pepper and cook for 1 minute.
Add the diced tomatoes (with their juices), kidney beans, and beef broth to the pot.
Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook for 20 to 25 minutes, or until the chili has thickened and the flavors have melded together.
Season the chili with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve the chili hot, garnished with a dollop of sour cream, shredded cheddar cheese, and sliced green onions.

recipes.title: Chicken Fajitas
recipes.description: These sizzling fajitas are loaded with tender chicken, sautéed peppers and onions, and all your favorite toppings.
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breasts, sliced
Salt and black pepper, to taste
Optional toppings: shredded cheese, sour cream, guacamole, salsa, chopped cilantro
instructions: Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the chicken and sauté for 5 to 7 minutes, or until cooked through.
Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
Add the peppers and onion to the skillet and sauté for 5 minutes, or until softened.
Stir in the chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper.
Add the chicken back to the skillet and toss to combine with the pepper mixture.
Serve the chicken fajitas in warm tortillas, with your desired toppings.

recipes.title: Roasted Chicken with Lemon and Garlic
recipes.description: This easy roasted chicken is packed with flavor, thanks to a simple marinade of lemon and garlic.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper, to taste
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together the garlic, olive oil, rosemary, salt, and black pepper.
Place the chicken in a large resealable plastic bag.
Pour the marinade over the chicken, making sure it is evenly coated.
Add the lemon slices to the bag and seal it tightly.
Marinate the chicken in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours, or overnight.
Preheat the oven to 425°F.
Remove the chicken from the bag and discard the marinade and lemon slices.
Place the chicken on a roasting pan and season it with additional salt and black pepper, if desired.
Roast the chicken for 50 to 60 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F.
Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes before carving and serving.

recipes.title: Baked Salmon with Lemon and Garlic
recipes.description: This healthy and delicious salmon dish is perfect for a quick and easy dinner.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper, to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F.
Place the salmon fillets in a baking dish.
In a small bowl, whisk together the melted butter and minced garlic.
Drizzle the butter mixture over the salmon fillets.
Season the salmon with salt and black pepper to taste.
Arrange the lemon slices on top of the salmon fillets.
Bake for 12 to 15 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Crispy Baked Chicken Wings
recipes.description: These crispy chicken wings are baked in the oven until golden brown and delicious. They make a great appetizer or main dish.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 425°F.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, toss the chicken wings with the baking powder, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, paprika, and cayenne pepper.
Arrange the chicken wings in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake for 45 to 50 minutes, or until the chicken wings are crispy and golden brown.
In a small bowl, whisk together the melted butter and hot sauce.
Remove the chicken wings from the oven and drizzle the hot sauce mixture over them.
Toss the chicken wings to coat them in the sauce.
Serve the crispy baked chicken wings hot, with your favorite dipping sauce.

recipes.title: Crispy Air Fryer Fried Chicken
recipes.description: This crispy fried chicken is made in the air fryer and is perfect for a healthier version of a classic comfort food.
instructions: Preheat the air fryer to 400°F.
In a shallow dish, whisk together the flour, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, thyme, salt, and black pepper.
In another shallow dish, whisk together the eggs and milk.
In a third shallow dish, add the panko bread crumbs.
Dip each chicken drumstick first into the flour mixture, then into the egg mixture, and finally into the panko bread crumbs, pressing the crumbs onto the chicken to adhere.
Place the chicken drumsticks in the air fryer basket in a single layer, spraying them with cooking spray.
Cook the chicken drumsticks for 20 to 25 minutes, flipping them halfway through the cooking time, or until the chicken is cooked through and the coating is crispy and golden brown.
Serve the crispy air fryer fried chicken hot, with your favorite dipping sauce.

recipes.title: Air Fryer Salmon
recipes.description: This healthy and delicious salmon recipe is made in the air fryer for a quick and easy dinner option. The salmon is seasoned with simple ingredients and cooks perfectly in the air fryer, resulting in a crispy and flavorful dish.
instructions: Preheat your air fryer to 375°F.
Season the salmon fillets with olive oil, garlic powder, smoked paprika, salt, and black pepper.
Place the salmon fillets in the air fryer basket in a single layer, skin side down.
Cook for 8-10 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
Serve the salmon hot with lemon wedges.

recipes.title: No-Bake Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars
recipes.description: These no-bake chocolate peanut butter bars are an easy and delicious dessert that requires only a few ingredients. They are perfect for chocolate and peanut butter lovers!
instructions: In a large mixing bowl, combine the peanut butter, honey, and coconut oil. Microwave for 30 seconds or until the mixture is smooth.
Add the rolled oats and mix well.
Press the mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish lined with parchment paper.
Melt the chocolate chips in a microwave-safe bowl and spread over the peanut butter mixture.
Sprinkle the chopped peanuts over the chocolate.
Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.
Cut into bars and serve chilled.

recipes.title: No-Bake Lemon Cheesecake
recipes.description: This no-bake lemon cheesecake is a refreshing and easy dessert that is perfect for spring and summer. It is made with cream cheese, lemon juice, and a graham cracker crust.
instructions: In a mixing bowl, combine the graham cracker crumbs, granulated sugar, and melted butter. Mix until well combined.
Press the mixture into a 9-inch springform pan and refrigerate for 10 minutes.
In another mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese until smooth. Add the powdered sugar, lemon juice, and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.
In a separate bowl, whip the heavy cream until stiff peaks form.
Fold the whipped cream into the cream cheese mixture.
Pour the mixture into the prepared crust.
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or until set.
Garnish with lemon slices and serve chilled.

recipes.title: No-Bake Peanut Butter Cookies
recipes.description: These simple and delicious no-bake peanut butter cookies are perfect for when you're craving something sweet and don't want to turn on the oven. They're easy to make and require just a few simple ingredients.
instructions: In a large mixing bowl, stir together the quick oats, peanut butter, honey, cocoa powder, almond milk, vanilla extract, and salt until well combined.
Using a cookie scoop or spoon, drop the mixture onto a lined baking sheet, forming about 18 cookies.
Refrigerate the cookies for at least 30 minutes, or until firm.
Serve and enjoy!

recipes.title: No-Bake Chocolate Cheesecake
recipes.description: This rich and creamy no-bake chocolate cheesecake is the perfect dessert for any occasion. It's easy to make and requires just a few simple ingredients.
ingredients: Whipped cream and chocolate shavings, for topping
instructions: In a mixing bowl, stir together the crushed chocolate wafer cookies and melted butter until well combined.
Press the mixture into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan and refrigerate for 15 minutes, or until firm.
In a large mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese until smooth and creamy.
Add the powdered sugar, cocoa powder, and vanilla extract, and beat until well combined.
In a separate mixing bowl, beat the heavy cream until stiff peaks form.
Fold the whipped cream into the cream cheese mixture until well combined.
Fold in the melted chocolate chips until evenly distributed.
Pour the mixture over the crust in the springform pan and smooth the top.
Refrigerate the cheesecake for at least 4 hours, or until firm.
Serve chilled, topped with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

recipes.title: Potato and Egg Breakfast Skillet
recipes.description: A delicious breakfast skillet made with sliced potatoes and eggs, seasoned with paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, and thyme, and topped with shredded cheddar cheese and fresh parsley.
instructions: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.

Add the sliced potatoes to the skillet and season with salt, black pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, and dried thyme. Cook for 10-12 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the potatoes are tender and lightly browned.
Crack the eggs into the skillet on top of the potatoes. Cover the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until the egg whites are set but the yolks are still runny.
Sprinkle the shredded cheddar cheese over the eggs and potatoes. Cover the skillet again and cook for another 1-2 minutes, or until the cheese is melted.
Garnish the breakfast skillet with chopped fresh parsley and serve hot.

recipes.title: One-Pot Chicken and Rice Skillet
recipes.description: A delicious one-pot chicken and rice skillet made with chicken breasts, rice, vegetables, and seasonings.
instructions: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Season the chicken breasts with salt, black pepper, garlic powder, paprika, and dried thyme.
Add the chicken to the skillet and cook for 6-8 minutes per side, or until golden brown and cooked through. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
Add the onion, garlic, and bell peppers to the same skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until softened.
Stir in the rice and chicken broth. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the skillet.
Simmer the rice for 15-20 minutes, or until tender and the liquid is absorbed.
Stir in the frozen peas and return the chicken to the skillet. Cover the skillet and cook for another 5 minutes, or until the peas are heated through and the chicken is warmed.
Garnish the chicken and rice skillet with chopped fresh parsley and serve hot.

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken and Veggie Wraps
recipes.description: Grilled chicken and veggies wrapped in a tortilla, perfect for a healthy lunch!
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season the chicken breasts with salt, black pepper, garlic powder, and smoked paprika. Drizzle with olive oil and toss to coat.
Grill the chicken for 6-8 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Remove from the grill and let cool slightly.
While the chicken is cooking, prepare the vegetables. Toss the sliced onion, bell peppers, and zucchini with olive oil, salt, and black pepper.
Grill the vegetables for 3-4 minutes per side, or until tender and slightly charred. Remove from the grill and let cool slightly.
In a small bowl, mix together the Greek yogurt, dill, and lemon juice.
To assemble the wraps, spread a spoonful of the yogurt mixture onto each tortilla. Top with sliced chicken and grilled vegetables. Roll up tightly and cut in half before serving.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: A creamy and comforting Italian classic, Mushroom Risotto is a delicious vegetarian dinner option.
instructions: In a medium saucepan, heat the vegetable broth over low heat.
In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic, and sauté for 2-3 minutes, or until the onion is translucent.
Add the sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook for 5-6 minutes, or until they release their liquid and begin to brown.
Add the Arborio rice to the skillet and stir to coat with the mushroom mixture. Cook for 1-2 minutes, or until the rice is slightly toasted.
Add the white wine to the skillet and stir until it is absorbed by the rice.
Add the hot vegetable broth to the skillet, 1 cup at a time, stirring constantly until each cup is absorbed before adding the next.
Continue adding the vegetable broth and stirring until the rice is tender and creamy, about 25-30 minutes.
Remove the skillet from heat and stir in the grated Parmesan cheese and butter until melted and combined.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and garnish with chopped fresh parsley before serving.

recipes.title: Grilled Steak with Chimichurri Sauce
recipes.description: A perfectly grilled steak served with a zesty and fresh chimichurri sauce.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Rub the steak with 2 tablespoons of olive oil, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper.
Grill the steak for 4-5 minutes per side or until desired doneness. Remove from grill and let rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing.
In a small bowl, whisk together the parsley, cilantro, oregano, minced garlic, red wine vinegar, and olive oil. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve the grilled steak sliced and topped with the chimichurri sauce.

recipes.title: Easy Spaghetti with Tomato Sauce
recipes.description: A simple and classic spaghetti recipe that anyone can make.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package directions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and sauté for 3-4 minutes until softened. Add the minced garlic and sauté for an additional 1-2 minutes.
Add the crushed tomatoes, dried oregano, salt, and black pepper. Bring the sauce to a simmer and cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the cooked spaghetti to the skillet with the tomato sauce and toss to coat. Serve hot, garnished with fresh basil and grated Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Easy Queso Dip
recipes.description: A delicious and easy-to-make queso dip that's perfect for game day or any gathering.
ingredients: 1 can (10 oz) diced tomatoes with green chilies, undrained
instructions: In a large microwave-safe bowl, combine the cubed Velveeta cheese, diced tomatoes with green chilies, milk, garlic powder, and cumin.
Microwave the mixture on high for 2-3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted, stirring every 30 seconds.
Stir the queso dip until smooth and well combined.
Serve hot with tortilla chips.
